review.description: I fundamentally hate spending money on a salad that costs pennies to make.  But guys whatever you're marinating that tofu in is worth the price of admission.  I am hooked.  (Plus the romaine was ridiculously crispy.  RIDICULOUSLY CRISPY!)
review.author: Louisa M.

review.description: Very friendly staff, easy ordering process, delicious food! Glad to see another spot with vegan options come to Dumbo!
review.author: Tori L.

review.description: Food was really good! Im glad i found this restaurant while in the dumbo area. Will was very nice and accommodating. Super friendly service and nice staff. I will def be back!!
review.author: NewYork Y.

review.description: So good! I'd never heard of this restaurant before but so happy they've opened a location in DUMBO. The food is flavorful and fresh. I've tried various sides and proteins and all have been a party in my mouth. On top of it all, they are reasonably priced (comparable to Dig Inn and Sweet Green). One of my new favorite "bowl" restaurants!
review.author: Dorothy J.

review.description: I live in the area and alternate this place with untamed sandwiches across the street. Super fast, friendly service, delicious bowls. Their chicken is so well seasoned and tender, and the crunches/sauces add a really nice touch.
review.author: A H.
